@frivalousMC - LMFAO! Have to agree with u WORD4WORD... I used to be one of the biggest supporters of Heroes, now I just spit venom at the mention of the name... I used to convert people into fans, now I tell people that haven't seen all of the last season (or more) not to bother, just keep the good memories they already have of it!!! Redemption finale was one of the worst and most painfully disappointing things I have seen on tv. I want to say MUCH more to diss it, but the show doesn't deserve the time that it would take to type my thoughts. After last season, I'm actually glad it's been cancelled - YEAH, I SAID IT!

Last episodes of this season 6, 17th & 18th or 120th & 121st episodes overall will both be shown next week on May 23 in one big series finale called "THE END".

Written by : Damon Lindelof & Carlton Cuse

The show will be two and a half hours long!
